description.value: Unlike basic siege engine armies, Greengripe Bombardiers can make melee Strikes while engaged. When a Greengripe Bombardier scores a critical success on a Strike while taking the Battle action against an army (but not against a fortification), the army struck must make a successful Maneuver check against the Greengripe Bombardiers' Maneuver DC or take one additional point of damage from the goblins' burning weaponry.
